lead_paragraph: KORRIS--Roma C.,on June 2, 2016. Beloved wife of 71 years to David L. Korris, DDS. Devoted mother of Risa Korris and James Korris. Cherished grandmother of Amanda Korris. Funeral Service will be Friday, June 3, 12 Noon at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 180 West 76th St., NYC. Interment to follow at Beth David Cemetery, Elmont, NY. Services by Gutterman's, Inc. For information, Call 516-764-9400. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KORRIS, ROMA C.
